title: Soul
disc: Since Gran died a few months ago, twenty-five-year-old Molly has been navigating life's complexities all by herself.

title: Alone
disc: By the time Carrie retires from tennis, she is the best player the world has ever seen. She has shattered every record.

title: Memory
disc: Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar are trying to get back to normal―they may have saved Crescent City, but with so much upheaval in their lives.

title: Crapshoot
disc: Nora Stephens’ life is books—she’s read them all—and she is not that type of heroine. Not the plucky one, not the laidback dream girl.

title: Snake Island
disc: A novel of art, time travel, love, and plague that takes the reader from Vancouver Island in 1912 to a dark colony on the moon. Edwin St.

title: Sin Eater
disc: A wildly inventive spin on the supernatural thriller, about a woman working as a nanny for a young boy with secrets.

title: Bad Boys
disc: Too many popular histories seek to establish heroes, pioneers and martyrs but as Huw Lemmey and Ben Miller argue, the past is filled with queer people.

title: Snatchers
disc: Boy meets boy. Boys become friends.The bestselling graphic novel about life, love, and everything that happens in between: this is the fourth volume of HEARTSTOPPER.

title: King of Park
